sentences.english: Your shipment of goods has been found short in weight by reinspection.
sentences.chinese: 经复验，发现贵方发送的货色短重。

sentences.english: We have a good assortment of goods to choose from.
sentences.chinese: 本公司货色齐全，花色多样，任凭挑选。

sentences.english: They are two of a kind.
There might be more after that, including an immense bundle of confidential diplomatic cables.
sentences.chinese: 陆续可能还有大量货色，包括成堆的机密外交电报。

sentences.english: What he told me was only half-truth.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉我的只是些半真半假的货色罢了。

sentences.english: The unused balance of each shipment is not cumulative to the following shipment.
sentences.chinese: 每批货色所支付的金额，尚未满额时不得积累利用。

sentences.english: Jaime would never abandon me for such a creature.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆决不会为这样的货色抛弃我。

sentences.english: She is horribly mean, but all her family are tarred with the same brush.
sentences.chinese: 地吝啬得可怕，而她的家里的人跟她都是一路货色。

sentences.english: Example:Those two are cut from the same cloth; neither is very honest.
sentences.chinese: 两个人是一路货色，没有一个诚实的。

sentences.english: I like to apprentice new attenuategs anytimey day.
Those two are cut from the same cloth; neither is very honest.
sentences.chinese: 两个人是一路货色，没有一个诚实的。

sentences.english: Volare was in that same category.
sentences.chinese: 伏拉雷也是同样的货色。

sentences.english: The Chinese are second rate sailors and airmen.
sentences.chinese: 中国的海空军只是二流货色。

sentences.english: How long will it take you to sell out these goods?
sentences.chinese: 卖完这些货色会花你多久？

sentences.english: Please deliver these goods immediately to the London dock.
sentences.chinese: 请立刻将这些货色运往伦敦船埠。

sentences.english: Enclosed is our invoice in triplicate for Art. No. 1204.
sentences.chinese: 随函附上1204号货色的发票一式三份。

definition: erhua variant of 玩意[wan2 yi4]
country bumpkin/boor/unsophisticated country person (humble, applied to oneself)/burial mound
best quality/item of the highest quality/(slang) outrageous/annoying in the extreme/gross/person with these qualities
toy/plaything/thing/act/trick (in a performance, stage show, acrobatics etc)
rare/uncommon/rarity/to value as a rarity/to cherish/Taiwan pr. [xi1 han3]
(Wu dialect) bum/wretched-looking tramp who lives by begging or stealing
